item.title: Tell Me You're Not PAYING For Equipment Leads
item.description: Stop wasting money on expensive equipment leads that often lead nowhere. There’s a smarter way to generate sales and marketing leads for your telephone systems and IT networking equipment: commission-based leads. This means you receive qualified leads from serious businesses in your area as they emerge, completely free of charge. You then select the leads you want to pursue and focus your efforts on closing the deal. Only after a successful sale and payment from the customer do you share a small percentage with the agency that provided the lead.
